item.description:
<strong>National Treasure (2004)...</strong>
It’s another treasure hunting movie. There is always having bad guys to force good guys for finding treasure. And a smart male title role, Nicolas Cage as Ben Gates, with a pretty female title role, Diane Kruger (Photos) as Abigail Chase. I feel ...
item.content:encoded:
National Treasure (2004)…

It’s another treasure hunting movie. There is always having bad guys to force good guys for finding treasure. And a smart male title role, Nicolas Cage as Ben Gates, with a pretty female title role, Diane Kruger (Photos) as Abigail Chase. I feel …
